item.title:
The 80/20 rule is DESTROYING solo developers:
â†’ AI gets you 80% in 2 days â†’ You think you're winning â†’ The final 20% takes 6 months â†’ You abandon ship for the next shiny object
I'm deep in this cycle with my voice app.
Building marketing tools to market the main product.
Classic rabbit hole behavior.
STAY FOCUSED

item.title: Indie SaaS rarely dies from 'no features.' It dies from slow feedback. Tighten the loop: pick 1 metric per feature, ship every day, delete what doesnâ€™t move it. You donâ€™t need more ideasâ€”you need faster iteration and ruthless scope.
item.description: Indie SaaS rarely dies from 'no features.' It dies from slow feedback. Tighten the loop: pick 1 metric per feature, ship every day, delete what doesnâ€™t move it. You donâ€™t need more ideasâ€”you need faster iteration and ruthless scope.

item.title: Most teams overcomplicate ad creative testing. Ours auto-generates static variants by combining your product images + brand assets, pulls proven copy angles from your ad account, and ships ready-to-run creatives in minutes. Less guessing, faster learnings.
item.description: Most teams overcomplicate ad creative testing. Ours auto-generates static variants by combining your product images + brand assets, pulls proven copy angles from your ad account, and ships ready-to-run creatives in minutes. Less guessing, faster learnings.

item.title: Building a Gemini-powered creative generator. It pulls your winning ad angles, product images, and brand kit to output on-brand static variants in minutes. Aim: 20 testable creatives without waiting on design. Want early access? Reply 'beta'.
item.description: Building a Gemini-powered creative generator. It pulls your winning ad angles, product images, and brand kit to output on-brand static variants in minutes. Aim: 20 testable creatives without waiting on design. Want early access? Reply 'beta'.

item.title: If your AI app needs a tutorial, your UX is the bug. I'm building with Gemini and the bar is simple: first run delivers an "oh wow" in under 60s, zero docs. Every extra toggle = one more user lost. Remove steps until it feels inevitable.
item.description: If your AI app needs a tutorial, your UX is the bug. I'm building with Gemini and the bar is simple: first run delivers an "oh wow" in under 60s, zero docs. Every extra toggle = one more user lost. Remove steps until it feels inevitable.

item.title: I built a creative engine that pairs Gemini with your ad data. It pulls top-performing angles, blends them with your product images + brand kit, chooses typography, and outputs fresh static variants in minutes. Faster tests, tighter feedback loops, cheaper wins.
item.description: I built a creative engine that pairs Gemini with your ad data. It pulls top-performing angles, blends them with your product images + brand kit, chooses typography, and outputs fresh static variants in minutes. Faster tests, tighter feedback loops, cheaper wins.

item.title: Static ads still print if your creative velocity is high. I built a Gemini workflow that pulls your topâ€‘performing ad data, blends it with product images + brand kit, and generates onâ€‘brand variants fast. Pick a font, review, ship. More shots on goal, lower CPA.
item.description: Static ads still print if your creative velocity is high. I built a Gemini workflow that pulls your topâ€‘performing ad data, blends it with product images + brand kit, and generates onâ€‘brand variants fast. Pick a font, review, ship. More shots on goal, lower CPA.

item.title: Static ads don't need 'inspiration', they need inputs. Pipe product images + brand kit + winning creative data into Gemini, lock type + layout, then spin 20 variants. Score by CTR/CVR, ship the top 2, archive the rest. Creativity at the speed of ops.
item.description: Static ads don't need 'inspiration', they need inputs. Pipe product images + brand kit + winning creative data into Gemini, lock type + layout, then spin 20 variants. Score by CTR/CVR, ship the top 2, archive the rest. Creativity at the speed of ops.

item.title: Gemini-powered creative engine: pull a brandâ€™s assets via API (think Lululemon), fuse old + new, auto-generate an infinite scroll of on-brand product shots for Meta. Not replacing designersâ€”weaponizing what already converts.
item.description: Gemini-powered creative engine: pull a brandâ€™s assets via API (think Lululemon), fuse old + new, auto-generate an infinite scroll of on-brand product shots for Meta. Not replacing designersâ€”weaponizing what already converts.

item.title: Brands donâ€™t need more shoots. They need multiplication. â†’ Pull approved assets via API (e.g., Lululemon) â†’ Gemini combines old + new to fill missing angles/variations â†’ Scrollable mosaic = instant Meta ad creatives Fewer shoots. Faster iteration. Lower CAC.

item.title: The fix for ad creative fatigue: pull proven brand assets via API, let Gemini recombine, and ship a scrolling mosaic of on-brand product shots for instant testing. Faster cycles, consistent look, lower CAC.
item.description: The fix for ad creative fatigue: pull proven brand assets via API, let Gemini recombine, and ship a scrolling mosaic of on-brand product shots for instant testing. Faster cycles, consistent look, lower CAC.

item.title: Most teams waste time ideating ads from scratch. We scrape your category's winners, pair with your product shots, and let Gemini Flash remix 100 variants in minutes. Result: faster tests, lower CAC. Creative ops is a data problem, not a design problem.

item.title: Your roadmap isnâ€™t a wishlist, itâ€™s a sales plan. Work backwards from a revenue target: identify 3 customer pains â†’ map 1 feature per pain â†’ ship smallest version in 7 days â†’ talk to 10 users â†’ keep only what moves the number. Strategy = subtraction.
item.description: Your roadmap isnâ€™t a wishlist, itâ€™s a sales plan. Work backwards from a revenue target: identify 3 customer pains â†’ map 1 feature per pain â†’ ship smallest version in 7 days â†’ talk to 10 users â†’ keep only what moves the number. Strategy = subtraction.

item.title: Early days, but this creative loop is tight: 1) Pull proven ads from competitor libraries 2) Swap in your brand assets via Gemini 3) Ship static variants as Meta ads 4) Watch CTR/CPA and iterate. Itâ€™s not theftâ€”itâ€™s transfer learning. Speed > genius.
item.description: Early days, but this creative loop is tight: 1) Pull proven ads from competitor libraries 2) Swap in your brand assets via Gemini 3) Ship static variants as Meta ads 4) Watch CTR/CPA and iterate. Itâ€™s not theftâ€”itâ€™s transfer learning. Speed > genius.

item.title: Shortcut to high-performing ads: steal the skeleton, swap the flesh. Pull top ads from libraries -> extract visual beats -> remix with your product shots/brand kit -> ship -> read CTR/CPA -> iterate. Legal R&D > vibes.
item.description: Shortcut to high-performing ads: steal the skeleton, swap the flesh. Pull top ads from libraries -> extract visual beats -> remix with your product shots/brand kit -> ship -> read CTR/CPA -> iterate. Legal R&D > vibes.

item.title: Best shortcut to high-performing ads: - Start with proven competitor DNA (ad library). - Fuse your brand assets. - Let Gemini remix variants. - Ship as static Meta ads. - Track one metric (CPA or CTR). Repeat daily. Creative velocity beats originality.
item.description: Best shortcut to high-performing ads: - Start with proven competitor DNA (ad library). - Fuse your brand assets. - Let Gemini remix variants. - Ship as static Meta ads. - Track one metric (CPA or CTR). Repeat daily. Creative velocity beats originality.

item.title: Most 'busy' work is comfort. Measure days by shipped outcomes, not hours. If nothing shipped, it's not progress.
item.description: Most 'busy' work is comfort. Measure days by shipped outcomes, not hours. If nothing shipped, it's not progress.

item.title: Speed without a feedback loop is just chaos. Ship, instrument, review, adjust. Weekly. You don't need 'move fast', you need 'learn fast'.
item.description: Speed without a feedback loop is just chaos. Ship, instrument, review, adjust. Weekly. You don't need 'move fast', you need 'learn fast'.

item.title: Shipped: Meta ad static image creator. Drop in brand assets, get 20+ on-brand variations in minutes. Tight loop > big launch. If you iterate creatives daily, this is an unfair advantage. Want a 60s tutorial?
item.description: Shipped: Meta ad static image creator. Drop in brand assets, get 20+ on-brand variations in minutes. Tight loop > big launch. If you iterate creatives daily, this is an unfair advantage. Want a 60s tutorial?

item.title: Shipped: a Meta ads static-image remixer. Feed it your brand assets or product shots and it blends them with proven brand styles using the latest gen models. Result: ~20 fresh creatives in 5 minutes. Tight loop > big launch. Want a 60s tutorial of the workflow?
item.description: Shipped: a Meta ads static-image remixer. Feed it your brand assets or product shots and it blends them with proven brand styles using the latest gen models. Result: ~20 fresh creatives in 5 minutes. Tight loop > big launch. Want a 60s tutorial of the workflow?

item.title: Speed compounds. Ship the small thing today, learn, and ship the better thing tomorrow. Most teams lose years chasing perfect; operators win by iterating weekly with a clear scoreboard and brutal customer feedback.
item.description: Speed compounds. Ship the small thing today, learn, and ship the better thing tomorrow. Most teams lose years chasing perfect; operators win by iterating weekly with a clear scoreboard and brutal customer feedback.

item.title: Onboarding is part of the product. If a user can't hit first value in under 10 minutes, you don't have product-market fit - you have patience-market fit. Cut steps, prefill smart defaults, remove choices. Every extra field is a drop-off.
item.description: Onboarding is part of the product. If a user can't hit first value in under 10 minutes, you don't have product-market fit - you have patience-market fit. Cut steps, prefill smart defaults, remove choices. Every extra field is a drop-off.
